My Enjimon
From the 'My Enjimon' window, users are able to see all of thier owned assets. It is here we will raise, train, and love our Enjimon. Inorder to make any calls to the smart contract that will interact with your Enjimon you must first specify and enter the token ID of your Enjimon (Special care should be taken to ensure your entering the correct ID. Your Enjimons ID can be found on its face card next to ID.) Utilizing the corresponding button users can feed, train, and battle their Enjimon.

Feed your Enjimon to prevent startvation, If your Enjimon startvation meter depletes this will cause the on slaught of immutable death. Once dead this action is irreversible.

Dicipline is needed for all forms of life. Enjimon are no different, through proper training your Enjmon will become more diciplent. Over time, learning to put off pesky things like starvation! Enjimon are rewarded for their effort with increased attribute stats. This can be useful when exploring the Wallet Monster Metaverse insearch of stolen artifacts.
